property.name: text
property.value: This model transformation demo shows how one can incorporate test configurations into a model desin. The tasks and arrows represent a typical workflow with regression testing. Run this model and observe its (deterministic) output. It is not enough to check the output alone to assert the model's behavior, because errors can occur without causing noticeable effect.

property.name: text
property.value: The test workflow is as follows: 1) Double click on the CreateLog transformation to run it. A bunch of actors will be created. Then run this model to record the signal on every channel in the Log parameter. 2) Double click on CleanUp to run it. The logging actors created by CreateLog will be removed. 3) Run CreateTest by double clicking on it, and then run this model to perform a regression test. If you do not see an error message (which you should not), it means the test has been passed.

svg.text: Author: Thomas Huining Feng (Inspired by Thomas Mandl)

property.name: Constraint2
message
property.value: Some signals in this model do not have their expected values.

property.name: Constraint
